channel.title: RuneScape 3
channel.description: what do you guys think? will people like palidino return and make new bases for RS3 private servers?

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

no one wants to make private servers when jagex continues to take two steps forward and one step back.

If I want to play rs3 I might aswell just play the real thing and go play WoW

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

If their becomes a popular following for eoc, yes; if not, no I don’t think people will make RS3-PS. They might use things from it but I doubt their would ever be an eoc RSPS nevermind RS3.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

:palm:

If you’re smart you don’t process all your data at once. You would filter/sort it with different categories. Geographic analysis is quite important. I am not going to explain to you on how powerful it is. Stay in school and complete your education.

Also my skill analysis was not based on ‘spins’. I forgot RS3 had that feature. It’s based on what is capable and has already BEEN DONE. He calls bs but doesn’t have a counter argument in which I would slap a response with proof of skills being maxed within a matter of days. Not all players can do it but the fact that it can be done… is quite depressing.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:31, topic:525160”]average would be based on different geographic locations. Hmm.[/quote]av·er·age - the result obtained by adding several quantities together and then dividing this total by the number of quantities; the mean.

doesnt matter where your data is spread apart geographically/geologically.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:

RS3 1-99 a week.

99 farming, slayer, mining, agility, hp, and fishing in a week? What is your secret? o.O

Farming no, hp no. Everything else… yea.

Bullshit.
[/quote]agreed…you do realize there is a weekly maximum you can buy spins of $500 right? lol That would only get a person an average of about 12=15 levels max.[/quote]
The average person would not waste $500 on spins anyways.

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:24, topic:525160”][quote author=Raexon link=topic=643852.msg4350512#msg4350512 date=1376577867]
I don’t know why they not getting rid of the evolution of combat because they lost more than half the player base
[/quote]

Well that’s an incredibly accurate and definitely not made up in any sense statistic.[/quote]I doubt jagex would reverse such a large update. Instead of you guys complaining about it either embrace or suggest to Jagex about the issue. Saying “remove eoc” won’t do anything.

edit: not saying that in a disrespectful way but it needs to be said complaining on a forum elsewhere than the rs forums isn’t going to do the cause any good.

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @Tyrone_Chicken Tyrone Chicken
item.description:
@Tyrone_Chicken wrote:

asshole_rule:

I think someone will make a base, but not Graham, Blake, or Pali (where did he come from…?).

I believe he was mentioning Pali because Pali released one of the first 503+ servers. So while it was awful he did help move the scene forward.

OT: I’m sure someone will make an RS3 server, but I just don’t see it happening any time soon.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I really hope no one creates a RuneScape 3 private server, that would be horrible. I like that RuneScape is switching to an efficient HTML 5 client, that’s the only plus. Of RuneScape 3 that I can see. And yes, I’ve tried it, only played for about two hours, before I got bored.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

For one, I think Pali is doing Battlescape 2 and it’s online.

Also the HTML5 client is not RS3.

My computer can’t even run Rs3

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 3
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:13, topic:525160”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=643852.msg4338741#msg4338741 date=1374790239]

Why didn’t they just release EoC with RS3 so it would actually be different from RS2? They’re pretty much the same.

Also, I would like Paladino to make some sources on RS3. I would love to see how they work and work with them.

RS3 is mainly graphical, interface, and audio updates.
[/quote]Well seeing as the HTML5 client has to utilize WebSockets, which are event-based, they probably changed how the client communicated with the server as well.[/quote]
Well yeah, but for the players, they only notice the things I mentioned. But then again, the HTML5 client isn’t out yet though.

Read full topic
